body.p: Also as a result of the global financial crisis, there was a particularly urgent need to improve transparency of fair value measurements for financial instruments. To address that need, the IASB amended IFRS 7 Financial Instruments: Disclosures in March 2009. The amended disclosures about fair value measurements have been relocated to IFRS 13.
